LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning: קיץ החל! אך החורף מתקרב. n\n\צמחי המזון שלך לא יגדלו בקור של החורף. תוודא לשמור מספיק אוכל כדי לשרוד. אתה יכול לבנות מקרר כדי למנוע ממזון להתקלקל.n\n\קנה, גנוב, או הכן מעילי פרווה, או שתקפא ברגע שתצא לבחוץ.
LanguageData.LetterRelationsChange_Hostile: יחסים עם {0} נשברו לחלוטין. הם עכשיו אגרסיבים אליך. == הם יבצעו תקיפות כל זמן מה על המושבה והקרוואנים שלך, וידחו הצעות לסחר איתך, אם אתה רוצה לשפר את היחסים, אתה יכול להציע להם מתנות בעזרת קרוואנים או תרמילי תחבורה.== זה קרה בגלל שהמוניטין ({1}) נפל מתחת ל{2}. בכדי להחזיר יחס ניטרלי, מוניטין חייב להגיע ל{3} שוב
LanguageData.LetterRelationsChange_NeutralFromHostile: יחסים עם {0} התחממו. הם עכשיו מחשיבים אותך כניטרלי ולא יתקפו אותך יותר.== זה קרה כי המוניטין ({1}) השתפר בעבר {2}. אם מוניטין יפול שוב מתחת ל{3}. {0} יהפכו לאגרסיבים שוב. אם המוניטין יעלה מעבר ל{4}, הם יהפכו לבני ברית שלך וילחמו עבורך
LanguageData.LetterRelationsChange_NeutralFromAlly: יחסים הם {0} התקררו. הם עכשיו מחשיבים אותך כניטרלי מאשר בן ברית.== הם עוד ידברו איתך בשלווה, אבל הם לא ישלחו לוחמים לעזור לך בשעת צרה.== זה קרה מכיוון שמוניטין ({1}) ירד מתחת ל{2}. אם המוניטין יפול מתחת ל{3}, {0} יהפכו לאגרסיבים. אם המוניטין יעלה מעל {4}, הם יהפכו לבני ברית שוב.
LanguageData.LetterRelationsChange_Ally: יחסים עם {0} נעשו ממש טובים. הם עכשיו מגדירים אותך כבן ברית.== בני ברית לפעמים יבואו לעזור להלחם באויבים שלך כשאתה מותקף, אתה גם יכול להתקשר אליהם בכל רגע עבור עזרה, במחיר של מוניטין.== הפכתם לבני ברית בגלל שהמוניטין שלך ({1}) עלה מעבר ל{2}. אם מוניטין יפול מתחת ל{3}, היחסים יחזרו לניטרלים.
LanguageData.AreaRevealedWithMechanoids: אזור חדש נחשף. הוא מכיל אנדרואידים עתיקים ואגרסיבים
LanguageData.RoofCollapsed: גג התמוטט בגלל שלא היה קורות תמיכה קרובות אליו
LanguageData.RelatedPawnInvolvedInQuest: יהיה שמח מאוד לזמן ארוך {0},[PAWN_nameDef] מת, {0} יסבול מטווח ארוך של עצבות. אבל, אם תצליח להציל את [PAWN_nameDef] הוא {1} של {0}. אם [PAWN_nameDef]
LanguageData.BirthdayChronological: זה היום הולדת הכרונולוגית של {0} היום! ביולוגית, {1} בן {3} שנים.== כרונולוגית, {1} היום {2}. קחו בחשבון שמכיוון שאנשים לא מזדקנים במהלך קריפטושינה, יום הולדת כרונולוגית שונה מיום הולדת ביולוגית.
LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} has gotten sick from {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {2} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.NewPartDisease: {0} has gotten sick from {3}. The infection is in [PAWN_possessive] {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {2} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.PawnWasFormerlyColonist: {0} was formerly part of your faction.
LanguageData.PawnHasTheseRelationshipsWithColonists: {0} has these relationships with your colonists:
LanguageData.PrisonerRescueTimeout: The camp will disappear after {0} days. If you miss this opportunity, you may never hear from {1} again.
LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: As {0} draws near the ancient wall, a sense of foreboding overcomes [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't sure why, but [PAWN_pronoun] feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromDamage: A {0} is attacking after being harmed!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromTaming: A {0} is attacking due to a taming attempt!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterOthers: Other {0} nearby have also become enraged!
LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {0} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it.
LanguageData.LetterLeaderChanged: {0} is no longer {3} of {1}.\n\nThe new {3} is {2}.
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidEnemy:
There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in the arriving group of {1}.

Keep in mind that even though they are related, they will still attack each other because of their bad factions relations.

These people are:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidFriendly: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in the arriving group of friendly {1}:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsNeutralGroup: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in the arriving group:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradeShip: The orbital trader is selling people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithSettlement: The settlement is selling people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithOtherCarava: The caravan is selling people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsGroupGeneric: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in the group:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsInMapWherePlayerLanded: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in the area where your {0} have landed.
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsSettlement: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in this settlement:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsSite: There are people who have relationships with your {0} or prisoners in this area:
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextColonist: [PAWN_nameDef] has a relationship with a colonist. [PAWN_pronoun] is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextPrisoner: [PAWN_nameDef] has a relationship with one of your prisoners. [PAWN_pronoun] is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.LetterAffair: {0}, married to {1}, has begun an affair with {2}.
LanguageData.LetterNoLongerLovers: {0} and {1} are no longer in a relationship.
LanguageData.LetterAcceptedProposal: At some point in the coming days or quadrums, they will have their marriage ceremony and invite all the colonists. Consider placing a marriage spot if you want to control where the ceremony occurs.
LanguageData.LetterRejectedProposal: {0} is going to be unhappy about this.
LanguageData.LetterPartBondedAnimalDied: {0} was bonded to {1}. It will affect {1}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterPartBondedAnimalDiedMulti: It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.LetterNewParty: {0} is throwing a party! Everyone who goes will gain recreation and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
LanguageData.LetterNewlyAddicted: {0} has developed an addiction to {1}.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] now has a need for {1}, visible on [PAWN_possessive] Needs tab. [PAWN_pronoun] will automatically consume the drug to fulfil [PAWN_possessive] need. If [PAWN_pronoun] cannot get any {1}, [PAWN_pronoun] will go into withdrawal.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBase: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.
LanguageData.LetterTransportPodsLandedInEnemyBase: Your transport pods have arrived at {0}.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated: The enemy base {0} has been destroyed.\n\nIn {1}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen by selecting the destroyed base and choosing the "Reform caravan" option.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated_FactionDestroy: This was the last base of {0}, which means this faction doesn't exist anymore.
LanguageData.LetterDefeatAllEnemiesQuestCompleted: You have defeated the enemy outpost!\n\nThe payment from {0} has arrived, and faction relations have improved by {1}.
LanguageData.LetterFoundPreciousLump:
Your long-range mineral scanner has found a lump of {0} nearby.

Unfortunately, it won't last - others will mine it first in {1} days if we don't.

{2}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Disaster:
The talks were a disaster. The delegates barely got past their initial greetings before the discussion broke down into insults and recriminations.

After your caravan departed early, {0} from {1} caught up with it and attacked!

Relations with {1}: {2}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Backfire: The talks have backfired. Despite trading some pleasantries, the delegates made no progress on substantive issues, and multiple statements were interpreted as insults.\n\nRelations with {0}: {1}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_TalksFlounder: The talks floundered. Delegates managed to communicate clearly and with basic respect, but were not able to make progress on any genuine issues.\n\nRelations with {0} remain unchanged.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Success: The talks were a success. The delegates reached new mutual understanding on several substantial issues.\n\nRelations with {0} have improved by {1}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Triumph:
The talks were a great triumph! Delegates connected quickly on a personal level and came to truly see each others' perspective on the most difficult issues of the day.

Relations with {0} have improved by {1}.

As your caravan departed, {0} offered you a gift:

{2}
LanguageData.PeaceTalksSocialXPGain: {0}, your negotiator, has gained {1} social experience.
LanguageData.LetterRunWildMentalBreak:
{0} is fed up with civilization.

[PAWN_pronoun] realized that wild creatures are always free. So, [PAWN_pronoun] has decided to leave your faction and live with the animals.

You can attempt to tame [PAWN_objective] to get [PAWN_objective] back.
LanguageData.LetterCatatonicMentalBreak: {0} has suffered a total mental breakdown and entered a catatonic state. [PAWN_pronoun] will recover in several days.
LanguageData.LetterAICoreOffer: {0} of {1} contacts you with an offer of information: the location of an AI persona core, which you'll need in order to build a spaceship. They inform you that this item is quite rare and usually its owners have it under heavy guard.\n\nCall them with your comms console if you're interested.
LanguageData.LetterCraftedLegendaryMessage: {0} has created a {1}.\n\nNews of this valuable artifact will spread across the world.
LanguageData.LetterPawnsLostBecauseMapClosed_Caravan: Your caravan has been lost. The following people and animals have been lost with it
LanguageData.LetterPawnsLostBecauseMapClosed_Home: The following people and animals have been abandoned
LanguageData.LetterHibernateComplete: Charlon Whitestone has finished the reactor's hibernation recovery sequence. The reactor is now ready to power a liftoff.
LanguageData.LetterHibernateCompleteStandalone: The reactor's power up sequence is complete. It is now ready to power a liftoff.
LanguageData.LetterVisitorsGaveGift: Since you're having a hard time, we're helping you out.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseProximity: Because you are so close to other factions, they feel you're encroaching on their territory.\n\nFor the last quadrum, faction relations have been reduced by:
LanguageData.LetterCaravansBattlefieldVictory: Your caravan has won the battle.\n\nIn {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen by selecting the battlefield and choosing the "Reform caravan" option.
LanguageData.LetterRescueQuestFinished: You have rescued [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] has joined your group.\n\nYou can take [PAWN_objective] with you by reforming the caravan in the World screen by selecting this area and choosing the "Reform caravan" option.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredAmbushMap: {0} has arrived at the ambush site.
